org.springframework.boot.actuate.metrics

Interface CounterService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferCounterService, DefaultCounterService, DropwizardMetricServices

    public interface CounterService
    A service that can be used to increment, decrement and reset a named counter value.
    Author:
    Dave Syer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decrement(String metricName)
      Decrement the specified counter by 1.
      void increment(String metricName)
      Increment the specified counter by 1.
      void reset(String metricName)
      Reset the specified counter.

    • Method Detail

      • increment

        void increment(String metricName)
        Increment the specified counter by 1.
        Parameters:
        metricName - the name of the counter

      • decrement

        void decrement(String metricName)
        Decrement the specified counter by 1.
        Parameters:
        metricName - the name of the counter

      • reset

        void reset(String metricName)
        Reset the specified counter.
        Parameters:
        metricName - the name of the counter
